section.p: The StopApplication task is used to stop a running application on a WebSphere server.
section.h2: Running StopApplication with definition in pom
section.p:
Running the StopApplication task with the definition defined in the build section of the pom (optional parameters omitted):
<dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>was5-plugin</artifactId> <version>1.0</version> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>was5-plugin</artifactId> <version>1.0</version> <executions> <execution> <id>stop application</id> <phase>validate</phase> <goals> <goal>StopApplication</goal> </goals> <configuration> <ear> ${artifactId}-${project.version}.ear </ear> <wasHome> C:/Programfiles/WebSphere/AppServer </wasHome> </configuration> </execution> </executions> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
